DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety physiologic effect increase dietary potassium intake individual heart failure .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Implementing High Potassium Diet Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: All patient classify HF , systolic diastolic . New York Heart Association class IIIII symptom . Treatment beta blocker , ACE inhibitor , angiotensin receptor blocker without adjustment previous month Intake baseline â‰¤ 3 serving fruit vegetable per day . Servings define Health Canada 's food guide . Patients episode decompensated heart failure , acute coronary syndrome , revascularization within previous 3 month study inclusion . Patients receive insulin therapy Glomerular filtration rate < 40mL/min/1.73 m2 Pregnancy lactation ( woman childbearing potential include negative pregnancy test prior inclusion ) . Inability provide inform consent .
